Notes: A Goomba wearing a metal helmet. Therefore, they have to be stunned with a Spin Attack first before the player can stomp its weak spot. However, they can be defeated using the Rainbow power-up, Yoshi's projectiles or by having Yoshi eat them. It drops a Coin or three Star Bits depending on how it was defeated.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will move around only if this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.

MoveLimitCollision.Description: The object's collision binder also checks for MoveLimit collision.
